data.text:
This presentation is available in video form at both YouTube channels below:

YouTube Channel: peopleofyahuwah2028

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTesoTBtJSuFvXlZp9XQndg

YouTube Channel: deptistill

https://www.youtube.com/user/deptistill

The Abary Language

The Abary language in our modern times is erroneously called “Hebrew” in the English language. The Abary language names and words which is the language of The Word of YAHUWAH have meaning. After a foreign name or word is transliterated into the Abary language, then we can find revelation and meaning hidden in the name or word.

Introduction

http://www.biblewheel.com/GR/GR_Database.php?SearchBy_Gematria=666

There are certain words in The Word of YAHUWAH that equal to 666 with their prefixes and suffixes. A list of these words can be found at the biblewheel.com website link.

I have recently been shown that in addition to being equal to the number 222, the name BARACK is equal to 666. The key to finding that the sum of the name BARACK is equal to 666 requires an understanding of the Abary alphabets and each letter’s numerical value and an understanding of the Abary prefixes and suffixes.

The Name Of BARACK And The Number 222

In Part 1 of this presentation, we found that the name of BARACK with his KINGDOM of The Beast is equal to 666. The name of BARACK without his KINGDOM is equal to 222 as follows:

B=BET=2

A=0 (a fill=in letter “A” has no numerical value)

R=RESH=200

A=0 (a fill=in letter “A” has no numerical value)

CK=K=20 (the letters “CK” can be counted as a digraph of two letters that make the one sound of “KAPH” or “K”)

TOTAL=222

The Significance Of 222 With The MARK

The number “TWO” (2) sounds like the Abary word “TUW” (H8420) which means “MARK”.

222=MARKMARKMARK

A repetition of numbers, names, and words in The Word of YAHUWAH means the people of YAHUWAH need to pay attention to the numbers, names, and words that repeat themselves. The name BARACK has an association with the MARK.

The Significance Of 222 With 666

Furthermore, both the Abary root words “SHAN” and “SHAT” mean “TWO” as follows:

SHAN(YAM) (H8147)=TWO, 2 (the “YAM” is a suffix)

SHAT(YAM) (H8147)=TWO, 2 (the “YAM” is a suffix)

SHAN (TWO, 2)=SHAT (TWO, 2)

SHAT (H8353)=SIX, 6

222=SHATSHATSHAT=666

The name BARACK is equal to 222 and 666.

The Number Of The Beast Is 666

Revelation 13:18 “Here is wisdom. Let him that hath understanding count the number of the beast: for it is the number of a man; and his number is Six hundred threescore and six.”

The Name And KINGDOM OF BARACK

The name and KINGDOM OF BARACK is equal to the following:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN (forward)

(see Part 1 for how we arrived at these letters)

The Name And KINGDOM OF BARACK Equals 666

The name and KINGDOM OF BARACK is equal to 666 as follows:

D=DALET=4 (a prefix means “of”)

B=BET=2

A=0 (a fill=in letter “A” has no numerical value)

R=RESH=200

A=0 (a fill=in letter “A” has no numerical value)

C=Y=YOD=10

K=X=T=TAW=400

N=NUN=50 (“N” at the end of a name means “KINGDOM”)

TOTAL=666

A Transliteration Of DBARACKN

A transliteration of DBARACKN into the Abary language is as follows:

DBARA(C)KN=DBARA(Y)KN (C=Y)

(DB)ARA(YKN) (we need to insert the Abary letter “a” which has an “ah” sound between the consonants “d” and “b”, “y” and “k”, and “k” and “n”)

DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

DBARAYKN=NAKAYARABAD (backwards)

The DRAGON GAVE POWER To THE BEAST

Revelation 13:2 “And the beast which I saw was like unto a leopard, and his feet were as the feet of a bear, and his mouth as the mouth of a lion: and the dragon gave him his power, and his seat, and great authority.”

The DRAGON GAVE POWER To The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The DRAGON GAVE POWER to The Beast is found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

(D)ABA(RA)YA(KAN)=DRAKAN=DRAKON (G1404)=DRAGON, a great serpent, a name for Shatan (Satan)

DA(BARA)YAKAN=BARA (H1262)=GIVE

DAB(AR)A(YAK)AN=ARYA(K)=ARYA(TS) (H6184)=terrible, terrible one, oppressor, mighty, POWER, strong, violent (K=C=TS)

The Name Of THE BEAST

The name of THE BEAST is found in the name of BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

DA(BAR)A(YA)KAN=BARY BARYA (H1278)=NEW (THING)

DAB(ARA)YA(K)AN=ARA ARAK=ARAQ (H772/H778)=EARTH (WORLD) (K=Q)

(DABAR)AYAKAN=DABAR (H1700)=ORDER

The name of THE BEAST is NEW WORLD ORDER.

“This Generation”

Matatyahuw (Matthew) 24:32-35

32 “Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is nigh: 33 So likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors. 34 Verily I say unto you, THIS GENERATION shall not pass, till all these things be fulfilled. 35 Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.”

“One Generation”

Any one who proclaims that “we the people” can stop the NEW WORLD ORDER is a liar. The Word of YAHUWAH prophesies that “this generation” which means “one generation” shall not pass before all these things are fulfilled. Well, we are the one generation that are witnesses to the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK. Therefore, someone in “this generation” will live to see the fulfillment of all the last days prophecies before YAHUWSHUWAH HAMASHYACH comes. The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is already here, and “this generation” will not be pre-tribulation “raptured” by YAHUWAH, but will serve as witnesses to the fulfillment of The Word of YAHUWAH.

The Levitation Of YAHUWSHUWAH

Acts 1:6-10

6 “When they therefore were come together, they asked of him, saying, Aduwny, wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to YAHSHARAHAL? 7 And he said unto them, It is not for you to know the times or the seasons, which the Aby (Head) hath put in his own power. 8 But ye shall receive power, after that the Ruwach HaQaduwsh (set-apart power) is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in YAHRUWSHALAM, and in all Yahuwdyah (Judaea), and in Shamaruwn (Samaria), and unto the uttermost part of the earth. 9 And when he had spoken these things, while they beheld, he was taken up; and a cloud received him out of their sight. 10 And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel;”

A Pre-Tribulation “Rapture”?

The Word of YAHUWAH reveals that YAHUWSHUWAH has the power to levitate and float into the sky and clouds. There is no mention of any type of aircraft or device being used to achieve this miracle which defies physics. The angels can levitate, but the question is, have the fallen angels given this power to the Man Kind?” There are rumors of a plan to “fake” a “rapture.” The people of YAHUWAH need to research levitation technology which could be used to “fake” a rapture, such as the use of magnetic fields to levitate and the use of holograms. The people of YAHUWAH will receive a “resurrection” (for the dead) or a change (for the alive) at the end of the great tribulation period, and the new body will be able to levitate.

The Name BARACK In The Abary Language

The name BARACK can be expressed in the Abary language as follows:

BARACK=BARACH

BARACK=BARAK

BARACK=BARAQ

All three of these Abary words sound like BARACK. Let’s take a look at what each of these words mean.

BARACK As BARACH

The name BARACK as BARACH has the following meaning:

BARACH (H1272)=flee, …away, chase(d), fain, flight, make haste, reach, shoot, to go through, run away, drive away, put to flight, reach, hurry away

BARACH (H1281)=crooked, noble, piercing, a fugitive, the serpent (as fleeing)

BARACK As BARAK

The name BARACK as BARAK has the following meaning:

BARAK(H1288/H1289/H1290/H1291/H1293/H1295)=BLESS, salute, CURSE, BLASPHEME, blessing, praised, kneel down, congratulate, kneel, make to kneel, a knee, blessed, present, LIBERAL, (fish-) pool, ponds, benediction, prosperity

1. Notice that the name BARACK can be a “blessing” or a “curse”.

2. Notice that the name BARACK is a name that means “blasphemy.”

The Definition Of LIBERAL

Liberal:

: believing that government should be active in supporting social and political change

: relating to or supporting political liberalism

: not opposed to new ideas or ways of behaving that are not traditional or widely accepted

obsolete : lacking moral restraint : licentious

4: not literal or strict : loose

5: broad-minded; especially : not bound by authoritarianism, orthodoxy, or traditional forms

The VILE PERSON Is Called LIBERAL

Yashyah (Isaiah) 32:5 “The VILE PERSON shall be no more called LIBERAL, nor the churl [scoundrel, fraudulent, deceitful, crafty] said to be bountiful.”

The name BARACK means LIBERAL, but The Word of YAHUWAH prophesies that the name LIBERAL means the same as VILE PERSON. Furthermore, the “obsolete” meaning of LIBERAL which is “lacking moral restraint” and “licentious” is in agreement with The Word of YAHUWAH. It is not a good thing to be called a LIBERAL.

BARACK As BARAQ

The name BARACK as BARAQ has the following meaning:

(H1299)=to flash lightning, cast forth (lightning)

(H1300)=lightning, glittering, bright, glitter, glittering sword

(H1303)=brier, thorn

(H1304)=carbuncle, a gem, precious stone, emerald

The Nicknames Of BARACK

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_nicknames_used_by_George_W._Bush

“Former American president George W. Bush is widely known to use nicknames to refer to journalists, fellow politicians, and members of his White House staff. His penchant for bestowing nicknames may come from his experiences with Skull and Bones, the Yale University secret society that gives every member a nickname. His was reportedly “Temporary”, because he never chose a permanent one.[1]”

George W. Bush nicknamed President Obama as follows:

“Bama, Rock – Barack Obama, former Democratic Senator, Illinois, Bush’s successor as President of the United States[29]”

The Nickname “BAMA”

The nickname “BAMA” in O(BAMA) has the following meaning:

BAMA (H929)=BEAST, cattle

BAMA (H1116)=HIGH PLACE, heights, waves, to be high, an elevation

BEMA (G968)=BAMA (transliterated)=judgment SEAT, THRONE, to set (one’s) foot on (E=A)

The Nickname “ROCK”

The nickname “ROCK” is found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

DABA(RA)YA(K)AN=RAK (H7404)=merchandise, traffick, trade=ROCK (pronounced the same)

D(ABA)RAYAKA(N)=ABAN (H68)=ROCK

“ROCK” is also the slang name for “crack cocaine” and “meth” The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom of “crack cocaine” and “meth” use. BARACK as BARAQ means “precious stone” or “precious ROCK.”

The MASONS

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freemasonry

“Freemasonry is a fraternal organisation that traces its origins to the local fraternities of stonemasons, which from the end of the fourteenth century regulated the qualifications of masons and their interaction with authorities and clients. The degrees of freemasonry, its gradal system, retain the three grades of medieval craft guilds, those of Apprentice, journeyman or fellow (now called Fellowcraft), and Master Mason. These are the degrees offered by craft, or blue lodge Freemasonry.”

Masonic Conspiracy Theories

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Masonic_conspiracy_theories

“Masonic conspiracy theories are conspiracy theories involving Freemasonry; hundreds of such conspiracy theories have been described since the late 18th century.[1] Generally, these theories fall into three distinct categories: political (usually involving allegations of control of government, particularly in the United States and the United Kingdom), religious (usually involving allegations of anti-Christian or Satanic beliefs or practices), and cultural (usually involving popular entertainment). Many conspiracy theory writers have connected Freemasons (and the Knights Templar) with worship of the devil;[2][3][4][5][6] these ideas are based on different interpretations of the doctrines of those organizations.[7]”

The New World Order Conspiracy Theory

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Masonic_conspiracy_theories

“George H. W. Bush New World Order Quotes”

“Of the claims that Freemasonry exerts control over politics, perhaps the best-known example is the New World Order theory, but there are others.”

We have already found the NEW WORLD ORDER in the KINGDOM OF BARACK. The NEW WORLD ORDER is not a conspiracy theory. Can we find the MASONS (Freemasonry) in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK?

The MASONS In The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The MASONS (Freemasonry) are found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

D(ABA)RAYAKA(N)=ABAN (H68)=MASON(S)

Be aware that a MASON doesn’t only build with ROCKS, STONES, and other tangible materials, but a MASON builds “big ideas” like the NEW WORLD ORDER.

“Skull And Bones”

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skull_and_Bones

“Skull and Bones is an undergraduate senior secret society at Yale University, New Haven, Connecticut. It is the oldest senior class landed society at Yale. The society’s alumni organization, the Russell Trust Association, owns the society’s real estate and oversees the organization. The society is known informally as “Bones”, and members are known as “Bonesmen”.[1]”

“Skull And Bones” Nicknames

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skull_and_Bones

“Members are assigned nicknames (e.g., “Long Devil”, the tallest member, and “Boaz”, a varsity football captain, or “Sherrife” prince of future). Many of the chosen names are drawn from literature (e.g., “Hamlet”, “Uncle Remus”), religion, and myth. The banker Lewis Lapham passed on his nickname, “Sancho Panza”, to the political adviser Tex McCrary. Averell Harriman was “Thor”, Henry Luce was “Baal”, McGeorge Bundy was “Odin”, and George H. W. Bush was “Magog”.[24]”

George W. Bush, Jr. And “Skull And Bones”

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skull_and_Bones

“In the 2004 U.S. Presidential election, both the Democratic and Republican nominees were alumni. George W. Bush wrote in his autobiography, “[In my] senior year I joined Skull and Bones, a secret society; so secret, I can’t say anything more.”[25] When asked what it meant that he and Bush were both Bonesmen, former Presidential candidate John Kerry said, “Not much, because it’s a secret.”[26][27]”

The BONES In The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The BONES are found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

DABARAYA(KAN)=KAN=QAN (H7070)=BONE(S) (K=Q)

A Transliteration Of My First Name

My first name is DEBBIE. A transliteration of my first name is as follows:

D-(E)-(B-B)-(I)-(E) (we need to remove the foreign letter “e” sound and insert the Abary letter “a” which has an “ah” sound, the “i” is equal to the Abary letter “yod” or “y”, the two “b” can be transliterated as two separate “b” between which we insert the letter “a” which has an “ah” sound or as one “b” sound because when my name is pronounced, we “hear” only one “b”)

D-A-B-A-B-Y-A or D-A-B-Y-A

DEBBIE=DABABYA (forward)

DEBBIE=DABYA (forward)

My First Name In The KINGDOM OF BARACK?

A form of my first name DEBBIE is found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DEBBIE=DABYA (forward)

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

(DAB)ARA(YA)KAN=DABYA=DEBBIE (my first name)

Former President “DUBYA”

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_nicknames_of_United_States_Presidents

According to a Wikipedia article entitled “List of Nicknames of United States Presidents”, George W. Bush’s nickname is as follows:

“Dubya,[112] based on a Texas pronunciation of “W”.[113]”

Therefore, the DABYA found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK which sounds similar to DUBYA may be a reference to former President George “W.” Bush who belongs to the Skull and Bones secret fraternity rather than a reference to me. It may be a reference to both of us.

A Transliteration Of N.W.O.

A transliteration of the acronym N.W.O. (New World Order) into the Abary language is as follows:

N-(W)-(O) (the “w” and “o” are equal to the Abary letter “waw” or “uw”)

N-UW-UW

NWO=NUWUW (forward)

NWO=UWUWN (backwards)

The Meaning In N.W.O.

Some of the meaning found in N.W.O. (New World Order) is as follows:

NWO=NUWUW (forward)

(NUW)UW=NUW=NY (H5204)=WAILING, LAMENTATION (UW=Y)

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom of WAILING and LAMENTATION.

The Meaning In N.W.O.

Some of the meaning found in N.W.O. (New World Order) is as follows:

NWO=NUWUW (forward)

(NUW)UW=NUW=NUW(A)=

(H5128)=to quiver, totter, shake, reel, stagger, wander, move, sift, make move, wave, waver, tremble, to move to and fro

HAARP

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_Frequency_Active_Auroral_Research_Program

“The High Frequency Active Auroral Research Program (HAARP) is an ionospheric research program jointly funded by the U.S. Air Force, the U.S. Navy, the University of Alaska, and the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA).[1] Designed and built by BAE Advanced Technologies (BAEAT), its purpose is to analyze the ionosphere and investigate the potential for developing ionospheric enhancement technology for radio communications and surveillance.[2] The HAARP program operates a major sub-arctic facility, named the HAARP Research Station, on an Air Force–owned site near Gakona, Alaska.”

HAARP Excites The Ionosphere

“The most prominent instrument at the HAARP Station is the Ionospheric Research Instrument (IRI), a high-power radio frequency transmitter facility operating in the high frequency (HF) band. The IRI is used to temporarily excite a limited area of the Ionosphere.”

A “quick” transliteration of IRI is as follows”

IRI=YARY (forward)

(YAR)Y=YAR (H3384)=teach, shoot, archers, cast, teacher, RAIN, laid, direct, inform, instructed, shewed, shooters, through, WATERED

The FEAR And EVIL In IRI And The KINGDOM OF BARACK

Some of the meaning in IRI and the KINGDOM OF BARACK is as follows:

IRI=YARY (forward)

(YAR)Y=YAR (H3372/H3373/H3374)=fear, afraid, terrible, terrible thing, dreadful, reverence, fearful, terrible acts, terror

(YAR)Y=YAR (H3415)=displease, grieved, grievous, evil, ill, harm, sad

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=NAKAYARABAD (backwards)

NAKA(YAR)ABAD=YAR

HAARP Conspiracy Theories

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_Frequency_Active_Auroral_Research_Program

“HAARP is the subject of numerous conspiracy theories. Various individuals have speculated hidden motives and capabilities to the project. For example, Rosalie Bertell warned in 1996 about the deployment of HAARP as a military weapon.[26] Michel Chossudovsky stated in a book published by the Committee on Monetary and Economic Reform that “recent scientific evidence suggests that HAARP is fully operational and has the ability of triggering floods, droughts, hurricanes and earthquakes.[27] Over time, HAARP has been blamed for triggering catastrophes such as floods, droughts, hurricanes, thunderstorms, earthquakes in Iran, Pakistan, Haiti, Turkey, Greece and the Philippines, major power outages, the downing of TWA Flight 800, Gulf War syndrome, and chronic fatigue syndrome.[5][28][29]”

The N.W.O. EARTHQUAKES

Matatyahuw (Matthew) 24:7 “For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be famines, and pestilences, and earthquakes, in divers places.”

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is the kingdom that the people of YAHUWAH have been warned will be a kingdom of “earthquakes in divers places.” There are those who believe that some of these earthquakes are artificially created. There are those who believe HAARP has the ability to manipulate the weather. The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom to be feared and will cause the people to tremble and quake with fear.

The EARTHQUAKES In The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The EARTHQUAKES are found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=NAKAYARABAD (backwards)

NAKA(YAR)ABAD=YAR (H5128)=to quiver, totter, shake, reel, stagger, wander, move, sift, make move, wave, waver, tremble, to move to and fro

NA(KA)YA(RA)BA(D)=KARAD=CHARAD (H2729)=afraid, tremble, fray away, careful, discomfited, fray, quaked (K=CH)

WAR FAMINE And PESTILENCE In The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The WAR, FAMINE, and PESTILENCE is found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=DABARAYAKAN (forward)

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=NAKAYARABAD (backwards)

NA(KA)YA(RAB)AD=KARAB=QARAB (H7128)=battle, war (K=Q)

NAKAYA(RAB)AD=RAB (H7458)=famine, hunger, dearth, famished

(DABAR)AYAKAN=DABAR (H1698)=pestilence, plagues, murrain

The “To And Fro” Of The Devil

Ayuwb (Job) 1:7 “And YAHUWAH said unto Shatan (Satan), Whence comest thou? Then Shatan (Satan) answered YAHUWAH, and said, From GOING TO AND FRO in the earth, and from WALKING UP AND DOWN in it.”

1 Peter 5:8 “Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, WALKETH ABOUT, seeking whom he may devour:”

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom that “moves to and fro” like the Devil, seeking whom it may devour.

A Meaning To Be Feared In HAARP

A “quick” transliteration of HAARP is as follows:

HAARP=HAARAP (forward)

One of the most fearful meanings in HAARP is as follows:

(HA)ARAP=HA=THE (a definite article)

HA(ARAP)=ARAP (H6202)=BEHEAD(ER), break..neck, strike off, break down, cut off..neck

HAARP has the meaning of THE BEHEAD(ER) in it.

The Meaning In N.W.O.

Some of the meaning found in N.W.O. (New World Order) is as follows:

NWO=UWUWN (backwards)

UW(UWN)=UWN (A)UWN=

H202=strength, might, force, goods, substance

H205/H5771=iniquity, wicked(ness), vanity, affliction, mischief, unrighteous, evil, false, idol, mourners, mourning, nought, sorrow, unjust, vain/punishment, fault, iniquities, sin, perversity

The Meaning In N.W.O.

Some of the meaning found in N.W.O. (New World Order) is as follows:

NWO=UWUWN (backwards)

UW(UWN)=UWN (A)UWN=

H5770=to eye, look at, to watch

H5772=duty of marriage, to dwell together, (sexual) cohabitation, conjugal cohabitation

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom of surveillance (EYE/WATCH), multiple marriages, multiple divorces, and multiple fornications.

A Transliteration Of N.W.O.

(with letter “Y” substitution)

(forward)

A transliteration of N.W.O. (New World Order) into the Abary language is as follows:

NWO=NUWUW (forward)

UW=Y

N(UW)(UW)=N(Y)(Y)

NWO=N(YY) (forward) (we need to insert the Abary letter “a” which has an “ah” sound between the consonants “y” and “y”)

NWO=NYAY (forward)

A Transliteration Of N.W.O.

(with letter “Y” substitution)

(backwards)

A transliteration of N.W.O. (New World Order) into the Abary language is as follows:

NWO=NYAY (forward)

NYAY (forward)=YA(YN) (backwards) (we need to insert the Abary letter “a” which has an “ah” sound between the consonants “y” and “n”)

NWO=YAYAN (backwards)

The Meaning In N.W.O.

(with the letter “Y” substitution)

(forward)

Some of the meaning found in N.W.O. (New World Order) is as follows:

NWO=NYAY (forward)

(NYA)Y=NYA=NUWA (H5146/H5270/H5106)=NOAH=REST, motion, disallow, discourage, make to non effect, break, to HINDER, hold back, forbid, RESTRAIN, frustrate, neutralize, dissuade (Y=UW)

The REST And RESTRAINTS Of The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom in search of a false REST through policies of peace and safety. The true REST will not come until YAHUWAH sends YAHUWSHUWAH to save His people.

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK places RESTRAINTS and HINDERS those who want to speak the truth of The Word of YAHUWAH.

The Meaning In N.W.O.

(with the letter “Y” substitution)

(backwards)

Some of the meaning found in N.W.O. (New World Order) is as follows:

NWO=YAYAN (backwards)

(YAYAN) (H3196)=wine, banqueting, winebibbers, intoxication

The INTOXICATED In The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom of BANQUETING (partying) people who are INTOXICATED with drugs (legal and illegal) as a false help to ease the WAILING and LAMENTATIONS of life.

Revelation 18:24 “And in her was found the blood of prophets, and of qaduwsh (H6918 set-apart ones), and of all that were slain upon the earth.”

The Word of YAHUWAH prophesies that there are also people who are INTOXICATED with the blood of the people on earth in these last days.

The MURDERERS In The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The MURDERERS are found in the NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK as follows:

DBARACKN=DBARAYKN=NAKAYARABAD (backwards)

(NAKA)YARABAD=NAK NAKA (H5221)=smite, slay, kill, beat, slaughter, stricken, given, wounded, strike, stripes

The NEW WORLD ORDER KINGDOM OF BARACK is a kingdom of murderers.

The Meaning In The KINGDOM OF BARACK

The wisdom of YAHUWAH requires the people of YAHUWAH to find the correct prefixes and suffixes that make the name BARACK with his KINGDOM OF The Beast grammatically sound and equal to 666 in the Abary language.

The name DBARACKN means KINGDOM OF BARACK.

I hope to continue my examination of the name BARACK with his KINGDOM OF The Beast in Part 3. I pray that YAHUWAH gives you understanding.

Take Heed! Shamar! Raah!

“Hitler’s father, Alois Hitler, Sr. (1837–1903), was the illegitimate child of Maria Anna Schicklgruber.[2] Because the baptismal register did not show the name of his father, Alois initially bore his mother’s surname, Schicklgruber. In 1842, Johann Georg Hiedler married Alois’s mother, Maria Anna. After she died in 1847 and Johann Georg Hiedler in 1856, Alois was brought up in the family of Hiedler’s brother, Johann Nepomuk Hiedler.[3] In 1876, Alois was legitimated and the baptismal register changed by a priest to register Johann Georg Hiedler as Alois’s father (recorded as Georg Hitler).[4][5]”

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nazi_salute

“The Nazi salute or Hitler salute (German: Hitlergruß – literally Hitler Greeting) is a gesture that was used as a greeting in Nazi Germany. The salute is performed by extending the right arm in the air with a straightened hand. Usually, the person offering the salute would say “Heil Hitler!” (Hail Hitler!), “Heil, mein Führer!” (Hail, my leader!), or “Sieg heil!” (Hail victory!). It was adopted in the 1930s by the Nazi Party to signal obedience to the party’s leader – Adolf Hitler – and to glorify the German nation (and later the German war effort). The salute was mandatory for civilians[1] but mostly optional for military personnel, who retained the traditional military salute until shortly after the failed assassination attempt on Hitler in 1944.[2]”
